content: Create advanced continuous learning feedback loop system with performance analysis, pattern learning, and adaptive strategy engines
Implement PerformanceAnalysisEngine for tracking task execution metrics and outcomes
Create PatternLearningSystem for success/failure pattern identification and storage
Implement AdaptiveStrategyEngine for automatic agent selection and task decomposition optimization
Create MetaCognitiveReflectionSystem for self-assessment and improvement planning
Integrate learning hooks into all agents via enhanced base class methods
Test continuous learning system with real task execution and validate improvement measurements
